GET /accounts/{accountId}/urlscanner/sca.description:
Search scans by date and webpages' requests, including full URL (after redirects), hostname, and path.
A successful scan will appear in search results a few minutes after finishing but may take much longer if the system in under load. By default, only successfully completed scans will appear in search results, unless searching by `scanId`. Please take into account that older scans may be removed from the search index at an unspecified time.

parameters.description: Account Id.
parameters.name: accountId

parameters.description: Scan uuid
parameters.name: scanId

parameters.description: Limit the number of objects in the response.
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Limit the number of objects in the response.

POST /accounts/{accountId}/urlscanner/sc.description: Submit a URL to scan. You can also set some options, like the visibility level and custom headers. Check limits at https://developers.cloudflare.com/security-center/investigate/scan-limits/.

parameters.description: Account Id.
parameters.name: accountId

screenshotsResolutions.description: Take multiple screenshots targeting different device types.

visibility.description: The option `Public` means it will be included in listings like recent scans and search results. `Unlisted` means it will not be included in the aforementioned listings, users will need to have the scan's ID to access it. A a scan will be automatically marked as unlisted if it fails, if it contains potential PII or other sensitive material.

time.description: Time when url was submitted for scanning.

url.description: Canonical form of submitted URL. Use this if you want to later search by URL.

message.example: Scan ID is not a valid uuid.

success.description: Whether request was successful or not

effectiveUrl.description: URL of the primary request, after all HTTP redirects

409.description: Scan request denied: hostname was recently scanned.
